pkgmetadata.longdescription: Matrix Bending // Bending non-positive-definite (symmetric) matrices to positive-definite, using weighted and unweighted methods. Jorjani, H., et al. (2003) doi:10.3168/jds.S0022-0302(03)73646-7. Schaeffer, L. R. (2010) http://animalbiosciences.uoguelph.ca/~lrs/piksLRS/PDforce.pdf.
